amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for travel by the Speaker of the House of Representatives to countries that are State sponsors of terrorism.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds for travel by the Speaker of the House of Representatives to countries that are State sponsors of terrorism.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 84 - 337 (Roll no. 541).
